invocations.description: Returns the special effect the spell causes; possible values are 'None', 'ConjureItem', 'Haste', 'Strength', 'ManaShield', 'Invisibility', 'Light', 'Enchantitem', 'SummonCreature', 'CancelInvisibility', 'CreatureIllusion', 'FindPerson', 'Levitate', 'MagicRope', 'MakeRune', 'Challenge' and 'HealParty'.
